channel.title: Cursor Placement on Templetes?
channel.description: Hello. I have created a simple template (similar to a questionnaire). Under each question, I have placed a "-" (to act as a bullet for answers). I want that whenever I start this template the cursor is placed after the first "-" which is below the first question. But the cursor is automatically shown on the last line of the Drafts (after "-" below the last question). How can o fix that? When I save the template I place the cursor where I want to be, but this won't affect the placement.
